articles.author: David Pasztor
articles.title: Mauricio Pochettino absolves Chelsea players of blame in embarrassing defeat against Arsenal - We Ain't Got No History
articles.description: So I guess we’re just giving up then?
articles.content:
These things happen, claims Mauricio Pochettino.
Of course, when you succumb to the worst defeat to Arsenal in your clubs 119-year history and the worst defeat in any London Derby since 1986, all th… [+3786 chars]
